sentences.en: Amid protests , Mahmoud Ahmadinejad is reelect ed as the president of Iran.
sentences.cn: 内贾德在一片质疑声中继续连任伊朗总统.

sentences.en: And proxy advisory firm Institutional Shareholder Services recently recommended that News Corp shareholders not reelect several board members, including chairman and CEO Rupert Murdoch, and his sons.
sentences.cn: 同时，代理顾问服务公司ISS建议新闻集团股东在今年的股东大会上改选几名董事会成员，包括新闻集团董事长兼CEO鲁伯特•默多克和他的两个儿子。

sentences.en: Mr John is busy nursing his constituency and calculating how he can be reelect ed.
sentences.cn: 约翰先生正忙着同自己的选民保持密切的接触,盘算着怎样才能再次当选.

sentences.en: There are some objections to the proposal to reelect the chairman.
sentences.cn: 对重新选举董事长的提议有人持反对意见.
